content: Search Free Trial Get Demo Day December 27, 2019 How Does CCPA Affect Me?  Businesses in California December 27, 2019 With the California Consumer Privacy Act CCPA set to be indoctrinated January 1st, 2020, businesses that are operating in California that fall under rule of law must take action.
